nodes.text: Arthur Adams (born April 5, 1963) is a comic book illustrator who drew one of the covers for the Classic Star Wars: A New Hope series published by Dark Horse Comics as well as contributing to the Rogue Squadron handbook. He started in the industry working for Marvel Comics on the mini-series titled Longshot published in 1985. He worked on a number of titles for Marvel through the years and later created his own series called Monkeyman and O'Brien published by Dark Horse.
